example.eg: The teacher stepped into the silent classroom, impressed by how well behaved the pupils were.
example.egtrans: 老师走进寂静的教师，看到学生们表现得这样好，印象甚是深刻。

example.eg: Simon asked Helen to tell him the truth, but she was silent.
example.egtrans: 西蒙要求海伦告诉他真相，但海伦只是默不作声。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 沉默的, 默不作声的

example.eg: Charlie Chaplin starred in a number of silent films.
Anne said she didn't mind moving to another town, but her silent wish was to stay in her current home.
The word "hour" in English is written with a silent h.
Before the technology existed to add soundtracks, all films were silents.
The students fell silent when the teacher entered the classroom.
The witness was being blackmailed to keep silent.
Pippa kept silent about Amber's involvement in the prank.
Gemma remained silent throughout the entire discussion.
The silent movie era was quite short: roughly 1900 to 1930.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无声电影, 无声缺氧，隐形缺氧

example.eg: The silent majority has no agenda, no power base, and no direction.

dsense.name: silent partner, also UK: sleeping partner
dsense.guideword: figurative (business investor with no active role)

example.eg: Dad's only a silent partner in the business: he never gets involved in decision making.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 隐名合伙人, 不参加经营的合伙人
